title: Why are the Enderman so fast?
self_text: I’ve been playing Minecraft for a while and I'm wondering how they can move so quickly. It is kind of weird that they can cover large distances in a short amount of time. Is there anything to it or am I just imagining things?

self_text: Hey everyone, I'm looking to find a specific type of sword in Minecraft and it’s really hard to find. The sword is the "Aspect of the End" sword that has blue and white colors. It looks like an Aspect of the Dragon Sword but with different colors. Any idea where I can get this?

I’ve tried different tools, different biomes and everything is normal except for when i mine obsidian. Can someone help?

I have tried everything I can think of but it still happens every time. I am using an iron suit with protection IV, blaze protection, and unbreaking III. I also have a shield equipped as well. What is causing this? Any tips?
